title: Drawing, "King David", 1750–66
medium: Brush and blue wash, pen and brown ink  on off-white laid paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: The youthful king is standing upon clouds and gazing upward in ecstasy. A seated putto holds the harp, at left.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "King David", 1750–66.
1750–66. Brush and blue wash, pen and brown ink  on off-white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-42.
